assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: EDGE Technology Inc. provides artificial intelligence (AI) support and big data analysis consulting services in Japan. It also offers AI introduction support services, such as data utilization; deep learning; data platform; artificial intelligence development, implementation, and big data analysis; diagnosis and analysis for AI model construction services; EDGE AI model, which include natural language processing model, image recognition model, data analysis, and optimization algorithm; Edge Algo platform that integrates open source software; and GeAIne platform. In addition, the company provides temporary staffing/engineer dispatch services comprises business consignment/dispatch, paid employment agency, and job posting services, as well as services related to the utilization of side business human resources, freelance human resources, and remote and home-based human resources. Further, it offers corporate training/AI education courses, including AI introduction training, AI technology training, python + mathematics, machine learning, and deep learning; and various platforms, such as BIGDATA NAVI, PMO NAVI, EDGE CAREER, AI job curry, AI Job Care PRO, and ED HACK. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.
